name: XFactor - Warriors of Savior ( The Dimension of the Crossover Battle )
name_original: XFactor - Warriors of Savior ( The Dimension of the Crossover Battle )
description:
Hi Everyone! , This is a Battle of the Crossovers! ( Like Super Smash Bros. ) .... United in different Stages & Characters ... And the Remixes of each Series & Characters! 

( Story & Credits in Notepad inside the Files )

Hope u have Fun!

:)
